mod.name: Hakumod
mod.credits:
Special thanks: 
 Hexanoid, SaltBadGuy, stevo2402, von_yaourt for testing the mod and providing feedback. 
 Rita-B: zhs translation.
mod.description:
Adds Haku-men from Blazblue as a new playable character. 
 
 This mod currently includes 75 cards, 7 relics and 3 potions. 
 
 For the latest patch notes: https://api.github.com/repos/celebo/hakumod/releases/latest 
 
 The starting cards can be selected and custom bosses enabled in the mod's configuration panel. 
 Path: Main menu > Mods > Hakumod > Config

relics.name: SUSANO'OH
relics.description: Every time you play 3 cards, gain 1 Magatama.
relics.flavorText: When this theme was released, 6B was a low.

relics.name: Chrono Phantasma
relics.description: At the start of each battle, gain Strength for every 15HP missing.
relics.flavorText: 5C > 623AA > J.2C > 2C > 9jc > J.2A > 9jc > Delay J.2C > 5A > 5B > 9jc > J.B2A > 9jc > J.B2A > J.214A

relics.name: Calamity Trigger

relics.name: Burst icon
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, add one Burst to your draw pile.
(Cost 0 -
Gain 1 Intangible.)

relics.name: Central Fiction
relics.description: Draw 1 more card at the start of each turn.

relics.name: Continuum Shift
relics.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, upgrade a random card.

relics.name: SUSANO'OH II
relics.description: Gain [R] and lose 1 Magatama at the start of each turn.
relics.flavorText: And people though he was gonna be low tier in CP1.0.

keywords.name: Command Order
keywords.description:
1: Reduce this card's cost by 1.
2: Draw 1 card.
3: Gain 1 Strength.
4: Upgrade all the cards in your hand.

keywords.name: Defense
keywords.description:
Creatures with Defense receive 20% less damage from Attacks for 1 turn.
Remove it if Offense is applied.

keywords.name: Ender
keywords.description:
Apply the effect if either:
- You have 0 Energy after playing that card.
- You have 0 Attacks left in your hand.

keywords.name: Fuumajin
keywords.description:
Gain 2 Block at the end of each turn. Evoke after 2 turns.
Evoke: Gain 1 magatama.

keywords.name: Gatling
keywords.description:
- If you have that card in your hand, reduce its cost by 1 this turn.
- If you don't, add that card into your hand but lose 2 Strengths until the end of the turn.

keywords.name: Offense
keywords.description:
Creatures with Offense deal 25% more damage with Attacks for 1 turn.
Remove it if Defense is applied.

keywords.name: Parry
keywords.description: Apply the effect if the enemy intends to attack.

keywords.name: Special
keywords.description: Specials consume Magatama(s) to activate their effect.

keywords.name: Starter
keywords.description: Apply the effect if your Energy is at its maximum.

keywords.name: White Void
keywords.description:
1: Gain 1 Magatama.
2: Gain 2 Plated Armor.
3: Gain 1 Strength.
4: Gain 2 Thorns.
5: All enemies lose 2 Strengths.
6: Draw 1 more card at the start of each turn.
7: Gain 1 additional [R] at the start of each turn.
8: ???
